title: Web Accessibility Checker
creator: Mads Kristensen
description: The easiest way to perform accessibility checks on any ASP.NET web application. Fully customizable and support all the major international accessibility standards.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
<abbr title="Web Content Accessibility Guidelines">WCAG</abbr> 1.0 — <abbr title="World Wide Web Consortium">W3C</abbr> Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0
